content: this legal document explains the progress of a mediation case involving a dispute over the distribution of shares in a company called immobil sud the parties involved have agreed to settle the dispute through mediation and redistribute the shares according to a specific percentage breakdown they request approval from the judge and the registrar of companies in cosenza to update the corporate structure accordingly the parties also agree to cover any liabilities of the company in proportion to their ownership one shareholder has already made three payments to equitalia and the remaining payments will be split equally among the parties they also agree to reimburse any expenses incurred during the mediation process the parties have agreed to a mediation fee of €40260 including vat the document is signed and closed on march 1 2015
